tool_description: Generates comprehensive audit trails for all data export and deletion operations to ensure regulatory compliance and accountability.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for audit trail generation

operation_type.description: Type of operation: data_export, data_deletion, or combined

operation_ids.description: List of operation identifiers to include in audit trail

include_system_logs.description: Whether to include detailed system logs

audit_level.description: Audit detail level: summary, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid operation type: Use one of [data_export, data_deletion, combined].
Operation not found: One or more specified operation IDs do not exist.
Audit generation failed: Unable to generate audit trail due to system errors.
Invalid audit level: Use one of [summary, standard, comprehensive].
Too many operations: Maximum of 50 operations can be included in a single audit trail.
usage: Provide customer_id, operation_type, and operation_ids from previous operations. Set include_system_logs and audit_level based on compliance requirements. Returns comprehensive audit documentation.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for this audit trail

operations_count.description: Number of operations included in audit trail

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, or requires_review

audit_file_path.description: Path to detailed audit trail document
